transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, hello, Am I speaking with Sultan here?
Speaker B: Yes, Sultan.
Speaker A: Bishop, this side. Calling you from Amber Student.
Speaker B: Come again?
Speaker A: Sultan, brush up this slide. Calling you from Amber Student.
Speaker B: Okay, Sultan, I can see that you're.
Speaker A: Looking to book chapter Lavisham three bed apartment, correct?
Speaker B: Yes.
Speaker A: So I just wanted to confirm like, what will be the payment plan for use? And like, how would you like to proceed? But before that, I'll be needing your WhatsApp number so that you know we can have all the confirmation over the WhatsApp as well. So can you please confirm like, when you'll be available to have a word with the WhatsApp?
Speaker B: Okay. Yes, you can send all the information to my WhatsApp.
Speaker A: Yeah, so like maybe like which number of yours is registered on WhatsApp? Because I have dropped you an email regarding this. So just share me, just reply me back over to your WhatsApp message WhatsApp number and then I'll be able to reach out to you. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay. My WhatsApp number is seven. Or you have.
Speaker A: 777.
Speaker B: Oh, one plus seven seven to 1-7017-0114-6146-5353-44 double four.
Speaker A: So it's plus seven seven zero double one four six five three four four. Is it?
Speaker B: Yes.
Speaker A: Let me check. Just a moment. Have you got a text message from me? Can you please share?
Speaker B: Yeah, I received a message from you.
Speaker A: Okay. So I'll be sending you all the details over there and then we can proceed ahead with the booking. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker A: Okay, thank you. Bye. Bye.
